subject: From: Micheal Peters <miche
body:
From: Micheal Peters <michealpeterss100@gmail.com>
Date: 03/17/22  
To:  
Subject: Re: I will do my best
Hello  
Why are you talking nonsense? Enough of all that crap and I'm telling you
you are delaying and you think you are delaying me. what kind of human being are you
Think about how many emails we wrote in one particular
matters and you still talk nonsense. You know what? Give me a full
power right now and if it doesn't work out today, I'll present another to the bank
who will be able to handle the matter. If me today
you will not give this power of attorney to introduce another recipient tomorrow morning,
I'll go to court and get a "CHANGE OF OWNERSHIP" certificate
entitles me to show the legal action to another bank
a beneficiary who will be able to handle this matter because I see
that you don't mean it.
Today I am just waiting for a copy of the power of attorney from you.
Michael Peters
Tel: +22899372642

subject: Re:    From: Micheal Peters <miche
body:
Dear Michael Peters,

I apologize if my previous communications have caused any confusion or frustration. I assure you that it is not my intention to delay the process or cause any inconvenience.

Regarding the power of attorney, I would need more information on what exactly is required from me. Could you please provide a detailed explanation or perhaps a template that I could use as a guide? 

Once again, I apologize for any misunderstanding and look forward to resolving this matter promptly.

Best wishes,
Steven
